prompt: Summarize all unread emails and Slack messages received between 8 PM yesterday and 8 AM today. Send the summary to me via email.
gold_response: Summarized unread messages from overnight and sent an email summary.

rubric.criteria: The agent must find unread emails and Slack messages from the specified time range (8 PM yesterday to 8 AM today).
The agent must create a summary of these messages.
The agent must send the summary via email.
